qas.question: When did Queen + Adam Lambert perform at the iHeartRadio Music Festival?
Where was the iHeartRadio Music Festival held in 2013?

answers.text: MGM Grand Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas

qas.question: On what show did Queen announce they would be touring with Adam Lambert?
When was the first Queen tour with Adam Lambert scheduled?
Who did Queen members say they were open to making a regular member of the band in 2014?

context: On <a0_0>20 September 2013<a0_0/>, Queen + Adam Lambert performed at the iHeartRadio Music Festival at the <a1_0>MGM Grand Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas<a1_0/>. On 6 March 2014, the band announced on <a2_0>Good Morning America<a2_0/> that Queen + Adam Lambert will tour North America in <a3_0>Summer 2014<a3_0/>. The band will also tour Australia and New Zealand in August/September 2014. In an interview with Rolling Stone, May and Taylor said that although the tour with <a4_0>Lambert<a4_0/> is a limited thing, they are open to him becoming an official member, and cutting new material with him.
